thread.title: TRACY

author: TRACY
title: TRACY
text: I have been using Backcountry Gear for about four years now and love them! Best selection of gear and the best service ever! My daughter was even going to U of O in Eugene so I stopped by their location a couple of times too! Great store and again, super friendly, helpful service! I continue to purchase from them first! Great deals and always the best service! Just ordered my second pair of MSR snowshoes and love!!!
